Articles.Content:
AIES space (Agencia de Investigaciones Espaciales Suprema)

The AIES project is a set pieces to make almost any type of mission, more than 80 pieces so far, engine, fuel tank of any size, Pods, fixed solar panels, SAS, rcs tank, landing legs among others. phase is Alpha and will be compatible with KSP 0.20.x is awaiting the final details to make it available to everyone.

I have taken the total development for quite some time, not only in build, also replaced and usually lead to removing the oldest for a better, even this development process continues to add pieces that can be quite useful in certain missions

_______________________________________________________________________________________

These are some possible configurations of rockets, also gives us the first glimpse of how they look, each size for certain types of cargoes

________________________________________________________________________________________

protective covers are separated by a small rocket that is at the tip and provides a safe disengaged without stopping the engine in the process.

________________________________________________________________________________________

Parts of the pieces are useful for construction of scanning probes.

________________________________________________________________________________________

attach possibility: small motors have the ability to add simultaneously without a connection point or (node stack)

Note:

1- Parabolic and antennas and are not included in the standard patch AIES, since I designed to work with the plugin (RemoteTech) will add a second download link for these parts.

2- I do not speak English and I translate a little effort, you may find bugs here and also in the description of the pieces AIES.

Your probe parts are amazing and I love the way you can add multiple engines without connection point. I usually prefer real spacecraft mods, but you definately have talent and I might give your mod a go.

Edited June 3, 2013 by Netris
Looks good, nice to see some more probe parts
Very nice looking parts. I'd love to play with them sending probes to all planets.

DL link?

(10char)
Nice! If DL link I will +rep!

Looks amazing, and I can't wait to use these parts.

If you need any help with english parts descriptions, just PM me. I'm happy to help.
This looks epic! Good quality and aesthetics.
Very Nice probe parts. What is the biggest diameter for the fuel tanks and fairings?

thank you very much for the support everyone!

the full mod will be available soon and i put the links in a new post in the "Addon Releases and Projects Showcase"

Very Nice probe parts. What is the biggest diameter for the fuel tanks and fairings?

here is a reference basically
This mod looks beautiful! Can we get some closer shots of the antennas and solar panel parts?
Looks great, Imo its already better than K.W. Rocketry because of those modular engine configurations. Please release it asap!
Gots to bump this thread.... These parts look and sound amazing!!!!!! PLease release them... my vains burn for more real life parts!!!!!

Gots to bump this thread.... These parts look and sound amazing!!!!!! PLease release them... my vains burn for more real life parts!!!!!

And Thank You for all of your hard work....

Looks great, Imo its already better than K.W. Rocketry because of those modular engine configurations. Please release it asap!

... I was going to do that for KW from the start, but I thought it would be more appreciated if we put in the effort and try and make a larger variety of engines instead, guess I was wrong.

... I was going to do that for KW from the start, but I thought it would be more appreciated if we put in the effort and try and make a larger variety of engines instead, guess I was wrong.

You have my appreciation Winston. My lifters are predominantly made from KW parts.

... I was going to do that for KW from the start, but I thought it would be more appreciated if we put in the effort and try and make a larger variety of engines instead, guess I was wrong.

Well to each and their own preferences, some people like carefully balanced and specialized engines, some people like to make their own configurations instead.

... I was going to do that for KW from the start, but I thought it would be more appreciated if we put in the effort and try and make a larger variety of engines instead, guess I was wrong.

You've done KW right. Back in the days, when I began KSP, I was looking for an engine mod and KW popped up. How convenient ? Now, I have a lot of mod, but KW is still a must have because it has it's own range. It's like your own society who build you a nice rocket. AIES is just a competitor and both are complementary
I am going to mainly use this mod. Well when it comes out that is.

You've done KW right. Back in the days, when I began KSP, I was looking for an engine mod and KW popped up. How convenient ? Now, I have a lot of mod, but KW is still a must have because it has it's own range. It's like your own society who build you a nice rocket. AIES is just a competitor and both are complementary

Quoted for truth.
Nicely done! I can't wait to see this released.

... I was going to do that for KW from the start, but I thought it would be more appreciated if we put in the effort and try and make a larger variety of engines instead, guess I was wrong.

I hope Winston isn't serious here, KW has been one of the fundamental mods for a long time. Probably just ribbing lyndonguitar, who could use a bit of that after his post. Always room for more mods. Speaking of which, I'm prepared to offer my services to test this good looking AIES project.
These parts look awesome. I love the realistic look on these
Beautiful probe parts there.
Love the stuff, can't wait!
